text: allaha ta'ala'e tamari sathenum potanum vacana sacum kari batavyum, jyare ke tame tena adesathi temane kapi rahya hata, ahim sudhi ke jyare tame kamajori dakhavi ane karyamam jhagado karava lagya ane avajna kari, te pachi ke tene (allaha) tamari manecchani vastu tamane batavi. Tamara manthi ketalaka duniya icchata hata, ane ketalakano irado akheratano hato, to pachi tene (allaha) tamane temanathi pheravi nakhya jethi tamari kasoti kari'e ane ninsanka tene (allaha) tamari bhulone mapha kari didhi ane imanavala'o mate allaha ta'ala ghano ja krpalu che
